declarations.description:
A web component for block and inline content warnings.

Based on the original concept: https://codepen.io/aarongustafson/pen/QWZpqPe
declarations.name: ContentWarningElement

slots.description: Default slot for the content that needs a warning

members.name: type
members.description: Space-separated list of warning types (e.g., "violence spoilers")

members.name: revealed
members.description: Whether the content has been revealed

events.name: content-warning:revealed
events.description: Fired when the content is revealed by the user

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Space-separated list of warning types (e.g., "violence spoilers")

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Display the warning inline instead of as a block overlay
